mapper.select: select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productlabor_cost t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productlabor_cost t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.status=0 and s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productlabor_cost t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where t.status=0
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname,s.specification as sspecification, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productlabor_cost t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu = u.id where s.id = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0
select count(*) from productlabor_cost t left outer join productboxinfo s on t.pid=s.id where s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0
select count(*) from productlabor_cost where status=0
mapper.insert: insert into productlabor_cost (id, pid, pielabor_price, tonlabor_price, status,date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pielaborPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tonlaborPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into productlabor_cost
id,
pid,
pielabor_price,
tonlabor_price,
status,
date,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pielaborPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{tonlaborPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update productlabor_cost
pid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pielabor_price = #{pielaborPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
tonlabor_price = #{tonlaborPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
